search_04_003/4301_0701_0100_10:
Wow, who knew there was a hidden spot like
this? This is a real adventure now!
search_04_003/4301_0701_0200_10:
I’m so glad we came—we got to see so many
precious stones!
search_04_003/4301_0701_0300_10:
Well, it looks like we’ve covered just
about everything.
search_04_003/4301_0701_0400_10:
What do you think, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
Had enough mining for one day yet?
search_04_003/4301_0702_0500_10:
That was awesome! You smashed all the rocks
out here!
search_04_003/4301_0702_0700_10:
As the man they call Roark the Rock, I can’t let
myself be outdone!
search_04_003/4301_0702_0800_10:
Looks like this is the end of the cave. Maybe it’s
time to head back for the day?
search_04_003/4301_0401_1100_10:
That brought me back to my time in the
Oreburgh Mine. Let’s go again sometime!
search_04_003/4301_0402_1300_10:
Hahaha, OK. You’ve got guts, huh? Let’s keep
looking until you’ve had enough.
